ygData.subject: Please trim message tails like good mailing list citizens?
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks a lot.  Today s daily digest got clipped by Gmail (not a big deal, but a sign of excess). And very little of it was new content, mostly just top-posting

Subject: Please trim message tails like good mailing list citizens?
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=221647988

Thanks a lot.  Today's daily digest got clipped by Gmail (not a big
deal, but a sign of excess).
And very little of it was new content, mostly just top-posting with
untrimmed-and-growing tails that were no longer relevant to the
ongoing discussion.
